title: Regarding the new client
body:
1. Is the client's log in screen suppose to have a loading time?
2. The champion select screen is very slow and sometimes freezes for a second before loading in the next screen and sometimes bugs out at the mastery page where i can't change my mysteries and results in me having to dodge my ranked game. Is this because of my computer or because of the client because my in games are perfectly fine. I know I don't have the best comp, but I am guessing  I would need higher specs for in game and not the client itself.

replies.body:
Fair warning: I'm not a developer that worked on the Beta Client, so my guesses are straight guesses based off what I've seen in the past.

1. Yes. The patcher checks for files while the Beta Client *loads* prior to you reaching the login screen.

2. We've seen some poor performance with the Beta Client on lower-spec machines. There are two features that can be toggled from the cog icon in the top-right of the client that may help with performance. I recommend enabling *Low spec mode* and *disabling animations*. Below is a screenshot showing what I mean:

http://image.prntscr.com/image/598e949fe2904c85b3220875cf13760f.png

Let me know if you have any questions.
